hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT A.COLUMN_NAME,A.DATA_TYPE,nvl(C.COMMENTS,A.COLUMN_NAME) as COMMENTS FROM sys.all_tab_columns A left join ALL_COL_COMMENTS C on A.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME and A.COLUMN_NAME = C.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = :tableName
select t.TABLE_NAME,t.COMMENTS from sys.all_tab_comments t where t.TABLE_NAME in :tableName
select table_name from sys.all_tab_comments where table_name like :tableName
select 1 from sys.all_tab_columns where TABLE_NAME = :tableName AND COLUMN_NAME = :columnName
